pageContext.geocode_address: Cottam Visitors Center, 300 Wakara Way, Salt Lake City, UT 84108, USA
pageContext.public_note: Fullday Camp! Spend your mornings learning about the amazing superheroes of the natural world. In the afternoon you can defeat the destructive forces of evil arch-villains as they threaten LEGOpolis! Building and nature combine in this camp.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: LEGO® Super Heroes need your help. Cruise the skies in the Helicarrier, tinker in Tony Stark's Workshop, and take on Super Villains on your Super Hero battletrack. Students will explore real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture while helping their favorite heroes save the day.
pageContext.course_type_name: Super Hero Master Engineering using LEGO® Materials
